# Raw Data Import

```{r import}
library(dsverse); library(tidyverse)
# library(tidylog)

# setting MSK ggplot theme, gtsummary theme, and color palette
theme_set(mskRvis::theme_biostat()); theme_gtsummary_pcctc(); mskRvis::set_msk_palette()

# example code for importing excel file
df_raw_data <-
  readxl::read_excel(
    path = here_data("Raw Data from PI.xlsx")
  ) %>%
  janitor::clean_names(case = "all_caps") %>% # uppercase col names
  mutate(across(where(is.POSIXt), as_date)) # use lubridates
```

# Save Analytic Data

```{r save}
# applying variable labels, and dropping raw variables
df_main <- df_main %>%
  set_variable_labels(path = here::here("scripts/derived_variables_{{stringr::str_split(folder_name, pattern = ' |-', simplify = T)[, 1] %>% tolower()}}.xlsx"))

# overview of master analytic dataset
skimr::skim(df_main)

#saving master analytic data set
save(df_main, here_data("derived-data", "raw-data-cleaned.Rdata"))
```
